short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Independent Chrome extension to help download pictures and videos in bulk from Brightwheel (childcare management tool)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you trying to download pictures or videos of your child from Brightwheel?While the official website from Brightwheel says that you cannot download your pictures in bulk and you must save each picture individually, this chrome extension makes it super easy to do just that with only one click! Just enter the date range of when the pictures were posted to Brightwheel and you can then download all your pictures in a single zip file.

Note: "Brightwheel" is a registered trademark of its respective owner. This Chrome extension is not affiliated with, approved by, sponsored by, or associated with Brightwheel or its affiliates. Use of the "Brightwheel" name in this extension's description is for identification purposes only and does not imply any association with the trademark holder. 

Privacy Note: This extension does not access, view, store, or transmit your login credentials, passwords, or any of your images/videos. Your email is collected in order to support an upgrade to a premium version through Stripe, a reputable, third party payment processor. We will never share or sell your email. 

## To use
1. Login to the Brightwheel portal
2. Once logged in, right click anywhere on the page and hit the "Bulk download media" in the right click menu.
3. A new tab will open with a form where you can specify which child, the start/end date and any keywords you want to exclude
4. Press Next, you should see how many pictures will be included in the zip file
5. Press Download and after a few seconds you should have a zip file in your default downloads folder with all the pictures and videos inside.
